thread.title: VIDEO: Racing Ferrol take inspiration from Harlem Globetrotters with incredible goal
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Racing Ferrol take inspiration from Harlem Globetrotters with incredible goal

title: VIDEO: Racing Ferrol take inspiration from Harlem Globetrotters with incredible goal
text:
0 Mar 16, 2017 00:53:06 From the incredible pass off the floor to Bicho's amazing scorpion effort, the Galicians' third goal against Palencia oozed class 
The Spanish third tier was treated to an incredible goal on Wednesday, with an improvised effort that could have come straight from the Harlem Globetrotters. 
Arsenal target Mbappe 'not for sale' 
Already 2-0 up against Palencia, Racing Ferrol were on the hunt for a third when one of their players went down in the area. 
When the ball came his way, however, he showed ninja-like reflexes to tee the ball up for the incoming Bicho. 
And if anything Bicho's finish was even more impressive, a flying backheel that gave the Palencia keeper no chance. Chega o terceiro gol para o @racingferrolsad da man de Bicho! @racingferrolsad 3-0 @CDPalencia pic.twitter.com/R1tFm6fxGC 
Racing went on to win the Segunda Division B encounter 4-1, but their outrageous third was undoubtedly the pick of the bunch. Related
